questions.question: How many legions had Brutus and Cassius gathered in the east?
Where did Brutus and Cassius take up position to face Antony and Octavian?
How many legions did Antony and Octavian have?
What did Brutus and Cassius do, after being defeated twice?
Who took credit for the victory?
Where did some of the remaining republicans flee to?
How did the allotment of provinces to the Triumvirs change after this?
options: Antony - Spain and Africa; Octavian - Greece and Asia; Lepidus - Gaul and Egypt
Antony - Egypt; Octavian - Greece; Lepidus - Gaul
Antony - Italy; Octavian - Macedonia; Lepidus - Syria
Antony - All of Gaul (except Cisalpine Gaul, now part of Italy). He also went east to
